main_section_html:
About us

Globalisation demands Languages - Within the globalized market, there is currently an international expansion and recognition of the different languages which is why it is necessary for professionals to learn new foreign languages to stay ahead of competition.

Since 2009, IBME is a preferred resource for all kinds of language services through various industries. IBME is one of the fastest growing language service providers that offer a wide range of language solutions that cater to specific needs of all types of Organisations and Institutions. Our experts are second to none and have been in the industry with decades of experience.

We have collectively trained more than 300,000 participants so far across verticals. We have more than 25+ companies working with us for their language solutions. We are dedicated to give excellent results with assurance of a high level of integrity and speed in the assignments undertaken. Our main aim is client growth and satisfaction. Our certified linguists are passionate about their work and every service is backed by our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.

Why Us?

  • Comprehensive Language Solutions

  • Personal Service and Continuous Support

  • Track Record of On Time Delivery

  • Security of Documents

  • Serious commitment to the needs, requirements and learning goals of each and every client

  • Proficient and experience in delivering language solutions

  • Extensive network of highly qualified direct industry experience linguists and experts

  • Industry-specific, tailor-made services that lead to business success

main_section_html:
Services

Training

Translation

Interpretation

Voice Overs

Subtitling

Content Development

Localization

Transcription

Multilingual DTP

Language Training

Language and cultural barriers are becoming challenging as companies are expanding globally, hiring from overseas, and attempting professional relationships with international business partners. We assist you to acquire the language skills necessary to succeed in the global marketplace.

Foreign language skill can determine if an employee is eligible to take global tasks. Our customized Corporate Language Training programs are designed to meet the needs of busy professionals and help them acquire necessary language skills in a minimum amount of time.

IBME offers tailored made programs offline and online to serve the needs of your company. On-going engagement, challenging learning environments, innovative methods, and progress tracking are vital elements of our training that significantly accelerate language learning.

We provide training in English, German, French, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Italian and many more languages.

Cross Cultural Training

An intercultural training is important to each one who works abroad, in a MNC or in an Indian company which has its presence outside India.

Our training gives importance on the factors that strongly impact business relationships across borders. The training is delivered in a very innovative style. Our courses comprise of group discussions, brainstorming and exercises that give participants exposure to actual situations and enable them to design their own customised approach to work more effectively with foreign colleagues, partners, suppliers or clients. These include;

  • Developing a Global Attitude (raising cultural awareness)

  • Business Etiquette & Culture (country specific)

  • Negotiating Across Cultures

  • Working with Remote & International Teams

Translations

Understanding a language is vital. Translations are very significant so that both the parties can understand each other well and can work effectively without any hurdles.

Some of our services are:

  • Technical Translation

  • Legal Translation

  • Medical Translation

  • Website Localization

  • Software Localization

  • Document Translation

  • Mobile Apps and Web Apps Translation

  • Book Translation

  • Annual Report Translation

  • Brochure Translation

  • Other Translations

We stand by high standards of accuracy and professionalism in translation services. We believe in:

  • A strong professional ethics and business conduct

  • Complete security and confidentiality

  • Translated content suited to the cultural, technical and linguistic needs of the target market

  • Multi language translators with the knowledge of local customs and culture of the target language

  • Professional translation keeping in mind the diction, word use and other details of the targeted language

  • Quality experts who validate the authenticity of our translation service

  • Cost-effective translation services

  • Capacity to deliver accurately translated text within the given time

Interpretation

In nearly every business and professional setting the need for quality interpreter services is growing. We offer full range of professional interpreting services connecting to highly trained interpreters for organizations to clearly communicate with every individual under any circumstance.

We offer following interpretations:

  • Simultaneous Interpreting

  • Consecutive Interpreting

  • Telephone Interpreting

  • Conference Interpreting



Voice Overs

We provide a high quality foreign voice casting and recording service, offering a selection of the best professional foreign voice acting talent at affordable price. Voice over services can be availed for:

  • Documentary

  • Advertising corporate Video

  • E Learning Courses

  • Product/ Service Presentation

  • Other services

Subtitling

Using foreign subtitling services and subtitle translation for your video content is a great way of targeting international audiences. Subtitles help the users in better understanding and grasping of the spoken content. Our subtitling experts use the latest subtitling software to produce a perfectly-synchronised delivery file, which will enable the audience to connect with the message. Subtitling can be carried for:

  • Documentaries & educational videos

  • Movies, short-films, animated films, TV-series

  • Computer games

  • News

Content Writing

The present scenario of digital media is highly depended on the content and it should be capable enough to communicate at broader region for enormous awareness irrespective of any language. Multilingual Content writing helps in converting international visitors into your customers. We provide different types of content writing for local businesses, International Companies and Start-ups.

Localization

Localization is the means of altering a product or content to a specific locality or market. Translation is only one of several elements of the localization process. In addition to translation, the localization process may also include:

  • Adjusting graphics to target markets

  • Reworking on matter to suit the tastes and consumption habits of other markets

  • Adapting design and layout to properly display translated text

  • Converting to local requirements (such as currencies and units of measure)

  • Using proper local formats for dates, addresses, and phone numbers

  • Addressing local regulations and legal requirements

The aim of localization is to give a product the look and feel of having been created specifically for a target market, no matter their language, culture, or location.

Transcription

Transcription in several languages with high level of accuracy and quick turnaround time. This helps give our customers a real economic advantage. We can provide a dedicated team of bilingual transcriptionists who offer flexible solutions to meet all your business needs.

Multilingual DTP

Your designed promotional pamphlets or regular publications make perfect sense in your home country, yet crossing the borders requires them to be translated, or more accurately; localized. Traditional translation will not probably accomplish your needs since the document layout might need to be redesigned as per the target language requirements, you actually need something more. That is simply called desktop publishing services or DTP and in some cases known as Typesetting. Examples of documents that require desktop publishing services are brochures, pamphlets, manuals, catalogues, or magazines.

main_section_html:
Testimonials

The uniqueness about IBME is a personal touch. It is the hands on approach that inspires a lot of confidence with the client. The services provided by them was tailor made based on the need of the client. They worked on the weakness & boosted the strengths. It was easy to do business with them as interaction was constant & regular. Face-to-face meetings were also an advantage. I would definitely recommend them to others, especially start-ups. If there is an opportunity I would definitely render their services.

  • Mr. Nirav Sampat, Vedic Pac Systems Pvt Ltd

They are committed, well prepared and have sound knowledge of the subject. After the German Language Training it became easier now to interact with the German Expats. They are always ready to customise the program as per our requirement and are cost effective. In all had a good experience working with them.

  • Mr Vaibhav Bodhe, Deputy HR, Benteler Automotive India Pvt. Ltd.

Ms. Dhara Mehta partnered with Knorr Bremse Technology Center as a Trainer/Faculty in an initiative to train its employees on Basic German Language, that culminated in a 80 hours of training module spread across 45 working days.

Based on our professional association with her I feel qualified to comment on her potential as a Trainer/Faculty and a subject expert in the field of German Linguistic Training.

Within the Professional development context, Ms. Dhara Mehta had an opportunity to closely guide and mentor our employees to explore learning from basic understanding to connecting between linguistic theory and practice. As a part of this training initiative she also collaborated with the Management team to customise the design and develop a series of lessons/learning modules which aimed at helping the employees to learn from basic concepts, practice what is learnt and dissimilate it in their day to day work wherever applicable.

The learning experience she crafted for our employees required good background research both, about the Company and its employees as well as a comprehensive assessment of employees prior to the session and post acquiring the knowledge which was flawlessly managed by her.

Throughout her engagement with us as a Faculty / Trainer she continued to develop a progressive approach to learning intervention and has been very proficient at planning, designing, developing and delivering appropriate, hands-on customised/need based solutions.

In short, Ms. Mehta is an excellent Faculty/Trainer for the German Language Training. Not only is she able to plan instructions that are engaging and developmentally appropriate, she also uses a variety of assessment strategies to monitor and evaluate the participants learning. She also masterfully orchestrates the classroom discussions, effectively manages classroom routines and participant’s behaviour as well.

  • Mr. Mahesh Balgi, Head HR and Admin, Knorr-Bremse Technology Center India Pvt. Ltd.

“Training and Interpreter services offered by Institute of Business Management & Entrepreneurship led by Ms. Dhara Mehta has been an important enabler for the business support and capability development of Engineers in Adient India Pvt. Ltd (formerly Johnson Controls Automotive Ltd) since 2014. Our Engineers have well benefited from the excellent German & Japanese language training being provided by Ms. Dhara Mehta. Their courses are thoughtfully designed and aptly delivered.

A proficient trainer and a sheer business professional that Ms. Dhara Mehta is, we appreciate her services to our organization and strongly recommend engaging Institute of Business Management & Entrepreneurship for their language & interpreter services”.

  • Mr. Kalpesh Vyas, Human Resources Business Partner, Adient India Pvt. Ltd
name: testimonials
title: Testimonials
